VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Vista Cinema relative to The Grand Celestial?
SRP.A: Azure Vista Cinema is {below} The Grand Celestial in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Vista Cinema}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Grand Celestial}.

VE.A: The Grand Celestial's cinema attendance in 1982 is {20000} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cinema Attendance in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cinema attendance is {20000.00} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cinema Attendance in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cinema attendance is {26325079.41} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cinema Attendance level recorded for Azure Vista Cinema?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema reached approximately {26325079.41} tickets in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cinema Attendance level recorded for Azure Vista Cinema?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema's lowest recorded level is approximately {2003284.17} tickets in {1960}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cinema Attendance?
SC.A: The average total cinema attendance is {10228774.61} tickets.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cinema Attendance fall between 8358869.84 and 9238750.88 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cinema Attendance exceed 12141657.46 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cinema Attendance go below 5455963.26 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1984, did the total Cinema Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1972?
NC.A: The change in total cinema attendance between 1972 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1987, was the average total Cinema Attendance higher or lower than between 1983 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total cinema attendance between 1963 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1983 and 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Cinema Attendance in 1976 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total cinema attendance in 1976 was {lower} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1978, was the average total Cinema Attendance higher or lower than between 1960 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total cinema attendance between 1967 and 1978 was {higher} than between 1960 and 1976.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Azure Vista Cinema} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {The Grand Celestial, Azure Vista Cinema}.
